name: Rapid Strike Scroll of the Flying Dragon
effect: The Rapid Strike Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)
author: 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Meteor
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 90 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
